lines.text:
[in a note to Sahibjaan]
Aapke paon dekhe, bahut haseen hai. / Inhe zameen par mat utariyega, maile ho jayenge.
[Saw your feet; they are very beautiful. / Don't place them on the ground, they will get dirty]
Tonight, I will see those feet you planted in my heart, performing in front of everyone. Will I be able to look?

[singing]
A moonlit night is far batter than a night with hundreds of stars...
Come, my love, come, / let us soar beyond the moon...
I am ready, / let us go...
Jo log doodh se jal jate hain woh chhas bhi phoonk phoonk kar peete hain.
[Those who get burnt by milk blow into buttermilk too before drinking it]
Afsos, log doodh se bhi jal jate hain.
[Alas, people get burnt by milk too]
This mansion is built on quicksand out of fog - it cannot give refuge to anyone.
